content: Zerodha Coin is the top choice for Direct Mutual Funds. It has 0 commission, a clean UI, and works seamlessly on both Android and iOS. Best for long-term SIP investors.
INDmoney is highly recommended for investing in US Stocks (Apple, Tesla, etc.) from India. It offers a great iOS and Android experience with low remittance fees.
Jar App is excellent for beginners who want to automate small savings into Digital Gold. It works automatically via SMS detection on Android (limited on iOS).
Groww offers a very simplified interface for F&O trading, making it less intimidating for new traders compared to Zerodha Kite. Available on all platforms.
Fold is a fantastic expense tracker that connects to your bank accounts (Account Aggregator). It has a premium iOS app and a solid Android version.
Stable Money allows you to book FDs in various banks with higher interest rates than standard savings accounts. Works well on both mobile platforms.
